result.title: Anyone can explain this example?
result.content:
Hello :).

I'm wondering if anyone can explain how the successive shortest path algorithm (for min cost flow) would work for the following example :). The attached image only shows the cost; the capacities are all 1 :). I understand that the algorithm would start off by going from 0->1->4->SINK. However, then I believe it would go 0->3->5->SINK instead of 0->1->4->2->5->SINK. Can anyone clarify :)?

IMAGE: http://imgur.com/z7Ywa6H
